attributes.action: That this country petition the United Nations to pass a resoltion declaring that ISIS organisationbe declared a War Criminal
attributes.additional_details:
In view of the actions and declared policies of ISIS and its so-called Islamic State with its clear policies to murder innocent people because of their religious choice that the organisation and its members be treated as war criminals. They and any person or organisation supporting them should be treated as accomplicies to war crimes. We should make it clear that ISIS is not representative of Islam.
The aim is to get international condemnation of this group through the United Nations.
